description: This story humorously depicts a snowman and a reindeer discovering the joy of riding an icicle.
title: Frosty's Icy Ride
n_1: Frosty finds an icicle shaped like a bicycle.
c1_1: Look at this icicle! It's perfect for a ride!
n_2: Frosty and Rudy try to balance on the icicle.
c2_2: Whoa, watch out for that snowdrift!
n_3: They laugh and slide through the snow.
c1_3: This is the best way to travel in winter!
c2_3: I agree, it's snow much fun!
n_4: They continue their joyful ride, spreading laughter.
